data.message: Messenger app invasion of privacy also check out you settings On your other apps like chrome and so on pictures with out your approval ( of who knows what) access to call logs and text messages,  ability to change and modify all of your accounts wtf Facebook

replies.message: We understand your concerns, Kimberly. Almost all apps must ask for permissions to run. Your trust is important to us and we encourage you to learn more about how Messenger actually uses these permissions here: http://on.fb.me/1qipTI7. -Natalie
